metadata.name: The Start of the Cessation #1
metadata.description:
The work is well-received for artist’s bold and vivid expression of "blue temperature“, a paradox created within a fire when it burns to its reddest and brightest color. With this fundamental concept, the artist maximizes the paradoxical effect as he portrays different ironic and/or opposite aspects of a thing or a universe in terms of its relationship with itself. 

#NFTart  #abstract   #red  #physical-based
